betsy.memory

Interface QuestionMemory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScoredQuestionMemory

    public interface QuestionMemory
    QuestionMemory is used to answer a user's questions, or find info related to a user's statements.
    Author:
    jacob

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WordTree<StructureTag> filterQuestion(WordTree<StructureTag> question)
      Get the phrase most likely to answer the question.
      WordTree<StructureTag> filterStatement(WordTree<StructureTag> statement)
      Get a statement most related to the provided one
      void storeStatement(WordTree<StructureTag> statement)
      Store a phrase from the user in memory, for use in future memory queries.

    • Method Detail

      • storeStatement

        void storeStatement(WordTree<StructureTag> statement)
        Store a phrase from the user in memory, for use in future memory queries.
        Parameters:
        statement - the phrase to store.

      • filterStatement

        WordTree<StructureTag> filterStatement(WordTree<StructureTag> statement)
        Get a statement most related to the provided one
        Parameters:
        statement - the statement to search for
        Returns:
        the closest match to the statement, or null

      • filterQuestion

        WordTree<StructureTag> filterQuestion(WordTree<StructureTag> question)
        Get the phrase most likely to answer the question. A full statement is not returned, only a phrase to fill in the missing info in the question.
        Parameters:
        question - The question phrase
        Returns:
        the most likely answer to the question, or null
